about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME
THIS IS A THIRD PERSON COMBAT RPGS GAME ABOUT KYJI (THE NAME OF THE GAME HERO) WHO WANTS TO BE THE GREATEST WORRIOR IN THE WORLD . THROUGH HER JOURNEY SHE OBTAINS WEAPONES AND ABILITYS TO HELP HER FIGHTING HER ENEMIES AND SHE TRAVELS IN 5 COUNTRIES TO SAVE THE WORLD.IN THE DEMO THERE IS ONLY ONE LEVEL TO PLAY.


.GOOD STORY TO PLAY.
.GOOD GRAPHIC
.FIGHT UNDERWORLD ENEMIES.



FUTURE UPDATES
.WILL INCREASE NUMBER OF LEVELS
.WILL ADD ARENA TO THE GAME
.WILL ADD A MULTIPLAYER.

fullgame.name: Samurai(The Rise Of Warrior)- 武士の台頭

legal_notice: Copyrights for the game and the name of compony,this game can be published on steam only not other sites

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.2.1 macOS Big Sur 11.6.4 macOS Catalina 10.15.7 macOS Mojave 10.14.6 macOS High Sierra 10.13.6 macOS Sierra 10.12.6 OS X El Capitan 10.11.6 OS X Yosemite 10.10.5 OS X Mavericks 10.9.5 OS X Mountain Lion 10.8.5 OS X Lion 10.7.5 Mac OS X Snow Leopard 10.6.8 Mac OS X Leopard 10.5.8 Mac OS X Tiger 10.4.11 Mac OS X Panther 10.3.9 Mac OS X Jaguar 10.2.8 Mac OS X Puma 10.1.5 Mac OS X Cheetah
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 980
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: all
